# Overview

This appendix provides comprehensive documentation of all parameters and calculations used in the economic analysis of the 1% Treaty and Decentralized FDA.

**Total parameters**: 422
- External sources (peer-reviewed): 130
- Calculated values: 243
- Core definitions: 49

:::{.callout-note}
## Data Transparency

All parameters are defined in [`dih_models/parameters.py`](https://github.com/FDA-AI/FDAi/blob/develop/apps/dfda-1/dih_models/parameters.py) with:
- Source attribution (`source_ref`)
- Confidence levels (high/medium/low)
- Peer review status
- Last update dates
- Mathematical formulas
:::
